channel.title: Windows Keyloggers and alternative ways to make them
channel.description: Other than GetAsyncKeyState and Hooks what else is available to get keyboard input for a keylogger? I was able to find a lot of info for these two, but not much for anything else.

item.title: Windows Keyloggers and alternative ways to make them
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic
